m_szDocTitle: Global rise reported in 2013 greenhouse gas emissions
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Global rise reported in 2013 greenhouse gas emissions Justin Gillissept The New York Times SHARES Global emissions of greenhouse gases jumped 2.3 percent in 2013 to record levels, scientists reported Sunday, in the latest indication that the world remains far off track in its efforts to control global warming. The emissions growth last year was a bit slower than the average growth rate of 2.5 percent over the past decade, and much of the dip was caused by an economic slowdown in China, which is the world's single largest source of emissions.
